ygData.subject: Re: Real females on Rallos Zek?
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a dark elf female cleric on Rallos Zek, and I haven t actually run into those problems there as much as I have on Povar.  Maybe it s the whole cleric
ygData.messageBody:
I play a dark elf female cleric on Rallos Zek, and I haven't actually run into
those problems there as much as I have on Povar. Maybe it's the whole cleric
thing, I dunno. On the other hand, I DID meet one of the best roleplayers I've
ever seen on that server, and after he rescued me from a pretty hairy
situation, he gave me patchwork leggings....unsolicited! He had just upgraded
and appreciated my roleplaying and effusive gratitude and thought I was worthy.
<shrugs> Nothing like that had ever happened to me on Povar. The PvP server
wasn't what I expected, I must say, and neither was playing a Dark elf
character. It's actually been a good experience!

Sara, Povar
Valdaya, Rallos Zek

MJ Solomon wrote:

> From: "MJ Solomon" <mjsol@...>
>
> My RL friend plays on Rallos Zek. He doesn't SAY he wants me to play there,
> but he keeps asking about the character I made on that server.
>
> Anyway Saturday I spent level 2 being chased by a "female" character named
> Typehere in the newbie area outside Kelethin. It was annoying, though
> there's no reason to whine and complain if you are playing on Rallos Zek.
> But I just no for certain that Typehere was NOT a real female.
>
> So I'm asking if there ARE any real females on Rallos Zek. I told my friend
> no, he said he thought there were.
> Anyone here play there? How do you put up with the annoyances? I'm as tough
> as anyone, but the game is challenging enough as it is, without worrying
> about "Typeheres."
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking to expand your world?
> http://www.onelist.com
> ONElist has 170,000 e-mail communities from which to choose!
